title: MLS Resources - Greater Springfield Board of Realtors

contentTree.content:
Lead Based Paint FAQ
					
					https://www.nar.realtor/lead-based-paint
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I can’t login to the Flex Pro app on my phone.
					
					The password is the same as your desktop login and is case-sensitive.  Make sure you capitalize if necessary.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I can’t change the Begin Date or Original List Price on my listing.
					
					Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is published.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Include any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I can’t change anything on my Closed or Authorization to Show listing.
					
					Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is Closed.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error.  Include any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I entered the wrong Sold Price or Concessions, or other Sold information.
					
					Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is Closed.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Attach any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I entered the wrong Selling Agent.
					
					If the listing is still in Pending status and has not been Closed, you can still edit the Selling Agent fields.Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is Closed.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Attach any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I entered the Sold Price, but it should not have been disclosed.
					
					Send an email to support@somomls.com containing a copy of the completed M125 form with both Buyer’s and Seller’s signatures, or copy of the contract if the non-disclosure statement was written in.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I entered an Authorization to Show and it needs corrections.
					
					Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is published.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Include any applicable documents, especially a copy of the signed contract, the settlement statement, and the Authorization to Show contract  Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I’m entering a new listing and the Subdivision, City, Schools, etc. are not in the menu.
					
					Send verification of the Subdivision Name, City, etc. and County where it’s located to support@somomls.com. Can be County Assessor’s records, CRS Data sheet, copy of Plat, etc. Programming usually takes 24-48 hours to complete.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												My Listing isn't showing on realtor.com, or has incorrect information.
					
					CLICK HERE for realtor.com supportIf your listing is showing the correct information in Flex, and it’s been more than 12 hours since the last change was made, realtor.com must correct the listing on their end.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												My Listing isn't showing on zillow.com, or has incorrect information.
					
					If your listing is showing the correct information in Flex, and it’s been more than 12 hours since the last change was made, zillow.com must correct the listing on their end.Email Zillow Support at agentcare@zillow.com.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I need to transfer my listings to my new office/broker.
					
					Listings belong to the Broker. If the listing will transfer with you to a new office, send a completed copy of the M125 form to support@gsbor.com. All signatures are required.  MLS Staff will transfer the listings to the new office.Note: Brokers should review the agent’s superuser access in Flex and request to add or remove access to other agent or office Flex accounts.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I received a fine and I’m not sure what it’s for.
					
					SOMO MLS emails the fine info to the email in your Flex profile, and saves a copy in Flex. Go to Menu and select My Violations and/or My Notifications. 
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												What is NAR's Clear Cooperation Policy?
					
					CLICK HERE to view the NAR Clear Cooperation Policy.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												What is NAR's Advertisement and Logo Policy?
					
					NAR’s Do’s and Don’ts of MLS Advertising  
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												Who owns the listing content?
					
					NAR’s How to Manage and Protect Listing Content
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												Another agent has violated the MLS rules in some way; how do I report the incident?
					
					If the agent has a listing in mls, click on the Report Violation button, which is located at the top right of the screen in the additional menu dropdown.If the violation has to do with a lockbox, sign in the yard, advertising on social media, etc. send an email to support@somomls.com with a photo or screenshot of the violation. Please check the MLS RULES before submitting a violation report.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												Another agent has violated the REALTOR code of ethics; how do I report the incident?
					
					See NAR’s website for more information on the code of ethics. 
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												What are the requirements for Volume Awards?
					
					Find the updated awards criteria in 2023 Volume Award Levels 
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												I want an IDX or RETS Feed, or I want to show MLS listings on my website.
					
					If you’d like to apply for a RETS Data Feed, download and complete the IDX Agreement and submit to support@somomls.com.  If you need a different solution, for example you use Word Press, Flex offers a full array of IDX solutions here fbsproducts.com.
				
							
					
													
															
								
														
												IDX FAQ
					
					https://www.nar.realtor/syndication/internet-display-of-listings-broker-considerations-for-syndication

Some violations, such as breaches of Clear Cooperation are not tied to an MLS listing. It is best to submit these types of violations directly to MLS admins and provide adequate verification.  Other rules violations not directly tied to listing data may also need to be reported from time to time. For these types of violations, please complete the Online MLS Violation Reporting Form.  Please do NOT use this form to report listing data errors. Listing information needing correction should be reported from the listing report, using the ‘Report Error’ button.
children.html: Some violations, such as breaches of Clear Cooperation are not tied to an MLS listing. It is best to submit these types of violations directly to MLS admins and provide adequate verification.  Other rules violations not directly tied to listing data may also need to be reported from time to time. For these types of violations, please complete the Online MLS Violation Reporting Form.  Please do NOT use this form to report listing data errors. Listing information needing correction should be reported from the listing report, using the ‘Report Error’ button.

children.content: Some violations, such as breaches of Clear Cooperation are not tied to an MLS listing. It is best to submit these types of violations directly to MLS admins and provide adequate verification.  Other rules violations not directly tied to listing data may also need to be reported from time to time. For these types of violations, please complete the Online MLS Violation Reporting Form.  Please do NOT use this form to report listing data errors. Listing information needing correction should be reported from the listing report, using the ‘Report Error’ button.

Web Accessibility
children.html: Web Accessibility

children.content: Web Accessibility

Greater Springfield Board of Realtors®, Inc. is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying relevant accessibility standards.

If you have difficulty accessing content, have difficulty viewing a file on the website, or notice any accessibility problems, please contact us to specify the nature of the accessibility issue and any assistive technology you use. We will strive to provide the content you need in the format you require.

Lead Based Paint FAQ

https://www.nar.realtor/lead-based-paint

I can’t login to the Flex Pro app on my phone.

The password is the same as your desktop login and is case-sensitive.  Make sure you capitalize if necessary.

I can’t change the Begin Date or Original List Price on my listing.

Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is published.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Include any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.

I can’t change anything on my Closed or Authorization to Show listing.

Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is Closed.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error.  Include any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.

I entered the wrong Sold Price or Concessions, or other Sold information.

Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is Closed.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Attach any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.

I entered the wrong Selling Agent.

If the listing is still in Pending status and has not been Closed, you can still edit the Selling Agent fields.

Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is Closed.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Attach any applicable documents, such as a signed contract showing the original or corrected date/price. Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.

I entered the Sold Price, but it should not have been disclosed.

Send an email to support@somomls.com containing a copy of the completed M125 form with both Buyer’s and Seller’s signatures, or copy of the contract if the non-disclosure statement was written in.

I entered an Authorization to Show and it needs corrections.

Only MLS staff can correct these once the listing is published.  Send an email to suppport@gsbor.com with the MLS# and explanation of the error. Include any applicable documents, especially a copy of the signed contract, the settlement statement, and the Authorization to Show contract  Corrections are usually completed with 48 hours.

I’m entering a new listing and the Subdivision, City, Schools, etc. are not in the menu.

Send verification of the Subdivision Name, City, etc. and County where it’s located to support@somomls.com. Can be County Assessor’s records, CRS Data sheet, copy of Plat, etc. Programming usually takes 24-48 hours to complete.

My Listing isn't showing on realtor.com, or has incorrect information.

CLICK HERE for realtor.com support

If your listing is showing the correct information in Flex, and it’s been more than 12 hours since the last change was made, realtor.com must correct the listing on their end.

My Listing isn't showing on zillow.com, or has incorrect information.

If your listing is showing the correct information in Flex, and it’s been more than 12 hours since the last change was made, zillow.com must correct the listing on their end.

Email Zillow Support at agentcare@zillow.com.

I need to transfer my listings to my new office/broker.

Listings belong to the Broker. If the listing will transfer with you to a new office, send a completed copy of the M125 form to support@gsbor.com. All signatures are required.  MLS Staff will transfer the listings to the new office.

Note: Brokers should review the agent’s superuser access in Flex and request to add or remove access to other agent or office Flex accounts.

I received a fine and I’m not sure what it’s for.

SOMO MLS emails the fine info to the email in your Flex profile, and saves a copy in Flex. Go to Menu and select My Violations and/or My Notifications.

What is NAR's Clear Cooperation Policy?

CLICK HERE to view the NAR Clear Cooperation Policy.

What is NAR's Advertisement and Logo Policy?
NAR’s Do’s and Don’ts of MLS Advertising

 

 

Who owns the listing content?
NAR’s How to Manage and Protect Listing Content
Another agent has violated the MLS rules in some way; how do I report the incident?

If the agent has a listing in mls, click on the Report Violation button, which is located at the top right of the screen in the additional menu dropdown.

If the violation has to do with a lockbox, sign in the yard, advertising on social media, etc. send an email to support@somomls.com with a photo or screenshot of the violation. 

Please check the MLS RULES before submitting a violation report.

Another agent has violated the REALTOR code of ethics; how do I report the incident?

See NAR’s website for more information on the code of ethics. 

What are the requirements for Volume Awards?

Find the updated awards criteria in 2023 Volume Award Levels

I want an IDX or RETS Feed, or I want to show MLS listings on my website.

If you’d like to apply for a RETS Data Feed, download and complete the IDX Agreement and submit to support@somomls.com. 

If you need a different solution, for example you use Word Press, Flex offers a full array of IDX solutions here fbsproducts.com.
